response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its advanced features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. I believe it could be an invaluable asset to you. Given its exceptional value, I'm offering it to you for $12,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive price, tailored specifically to your requirements. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 12000}
